results.name: Number of ways to write n = x + y (x, y > 0) with 2^x + y*(y+1)/2 prime.
comment: This implies that there are infinitely many primes each of which is a sum of a power of 2 and a triangular number.
See also A231201, A231555 and A231561 for other similar conjectures.
link: Zhi-Wei Sun, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..7000
